Annotation.String: This type describes the capabilities of a collection.
This type shall describe any capabilities of a collection in terms of how a client is able to create new resources within the collection.
This property contains the list of capabilities supported by this resource.
The value of this property shall be an array of Capability structures.
This type describes a specific capability of a collection for a given use case.
This type shall describe a specific capability of a collection in terms of how a client is able to create new resources within the collection for the specified use case.
Reference to the resource the client may GET to in order to understand how to form a POST request for a given collection.
The value of this property shall be a reference to a Resource that matches the type for the given collection and shall contain annotations that describe the properties allowed in the POST request.
This property represents the use case in which a client may issue a POST request to the collection.
The value of this property shall be an enumerated value describing the use case for this capability instance.
Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.
This capability describes a client creating a new ComputerSystem instance from a set of disaggregated hardware.
This capability describes a client creating a new Volume instance as part of an existing storage subsystem.
Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.
Reference to the collection that this capabilities structure is describing.

The value of this property shall be a reference to a Resource Collection that this structure is describing. This structure may be used by a client in order to understand how to form the POST request for the given collection.
The ID(s) of the resources associated with this capability.
The value of this property shall be an array of IDs containing pointers consistent with JSON pointer syntax to the resource that is related to this capability.
